TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GeneralTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.IFormattable

Docs.summary: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Transformations between 3-D objects take place through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A> methods, both of which return a GeneralTransform3D object. In the case that the transformation between the 3-D objects may be represented by a 4x4 matrix, the methods return an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class. The GeneralTransform3D class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>.
GeneralTransform3D is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Clone is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
CloneCurrentValue is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

Docs.summary: Gets the inverse transformation of this , if possible.
Docs.value: An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Inverse is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance string System.IFormattable.ToString(string format, class System.IFormatProvider provider) cil managed

Docs.param:
The format to use.
-or-
A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.

The provider to use to format the value.
-or-
A null reference ( in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.IFormattable.ToString%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=fullName>.
Docs.returns: The value of the current instance in the specified format.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IFormattable> interface.
IFormattable.ToString is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D Transform(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D point) cil managed

Docs.summary: Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Transform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D TransformBounds(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D rect) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
Docs.returns: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed .

remarks.format: ## Remarks TransformBounds is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool TryTransform (System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D inPoint, out System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D result);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryTransform(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D inPoint, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D result) cil managed

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
TryTransform is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
